DataElement.preferredName: Bioelectrical Impedance Dual X-ray Absorptometry Bone Mineral Density And Lean Body Mass Measurement Weight Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric response that represents the bone mineral content and lean muscle weight using a Dual X-ray Absorptometry measured in grams.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bioelectrical Impedance Dual X-ray Absorptometry Bone Mineral Density And Lean Body Mass Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Measurement of the mass of the body minus the fat as determined by either dual xray absorptometry or bioelectrical impedence. [Manually-curated]_An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A measure of the amount of minerals (mostly calcium and phosphorous) contained in a certain volume of bone. Bone mass measurements are used to diagnose osteoporosis (a condition marked by decreased bone mass), to see how well osteoporosis treatments are working, and to predict how likely the bones are to break. Low bone mass can occur in patients treated for cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Dual X-ray Absorptiometry Bioelectric Impedance Analysis Bone Mineral Density And Lean Body Mass
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A technique for scanning bone and measuring bone mineral density (BMD). A DXA scanner produces 2 X-ray beams, each with different energy levels. One beam is high energy while the other is low energy. The amount of x-rays that pass through the bone is measured for each beam. This will vary depending on the thickness of the bone. Based on the difference between the 2 beams, the bone density can be measured.:A method to assess body composition, i.e., the relative percentages of body weight comprised of fat tissue and lean body mass.  It is based on the principle that the resistance to an applied electric current is inversely related to the amount of lean body mass within the body. Impedance is greatest in fat tissue, which contains only 10-20% water, while lean body mass, which contains 70-75% water, allows the signal to pass much more easily.:A measure of the amount of minerals (mostly calcium and phosphorous) contained in a certain volume of bone. Bone mass measurements are used to diagnose osteoporosis (a condition marked by decreased bone mass), to see how well osteoporosis treatments are working, and to predict how likely the bones are to break. Low bone mass can occur in patients treated for cancer.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The mass of the body minus the fat.

Concepts.definition: A technique for scanning bone and measuring bone mineral density (BMD). A DXA scanner produces 2 X-ray beams, each with different energy levels. One beam is high energy while the other is low energy. The amount of x-rays that pass through the bone is measured for each beam. This will vary depending on the thickness of the bone. Based on the difference between the 2 beams, the bone density can be measured.

A method to assess body composition, i.e., the relative percentages of body weight comprised of fat tissue and lean body mass.  It is based on the principle that the resistance to an applied electric current is inversely related to the amount of lean body mass within the body. Impedance is greatest in fat tissue, which contains only 10-20% water, while lean body mass, which contains 70-75% water, allows the signal to pass much more easily.

A measure of the amount of minerals (mostly calcium and phosphorous) contained in a certain volume of bone. Bone mass measurements are used to diagnose osteoporosis (a condition marked by decreased bone mass), to see how well osteoporosis treatments are working, and to predict how likely the bones are to break. Low bone mass can occur in patients treated for cancer.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The mass of the body minus the fat.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The numerical result of the determination of the vertical force exerted by the mass of an individual as a result of gravity.
